title: How to Make Brigadeiros (Brazilian Chocolate Fudge Candy)

steps.headline: Mix the chocolate and condensed milk in a double boiler or heavy saucepan.
steps.description: Cook over low heat. Add the butter and stir constantly.

steps.headline: Stir continuously for two to three minutes.
Pour the mixture onto a plate and allow to cool.
steps.description: When it is cool to the touch, form small balls with your hands. Grease your hands a little to make the rolling process easier.

steps.headline: Roll the balls in the chocolate sprinkles.
Place each ball into a small candy case.
steps.description: Or, just leave them as they are.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: These are ideal with afternoon tea or supper. They are excellent coffee and tea accompaniments.
